# P
## Overview
| **Feats** | **Prerequisites** | **Benefits** |
|---|---|---|
| [[Pack Flanking (Feat)\|Pack Flanking]] | Int 13, [[Combat Expertise (Feat)\|Combat Expertise]], ability to acquire an animal companion | You and your companion creature flank regardless of position |
| [[Paralyzing Strike (Feat)\|Paralyzing Strike]]\* | Dex 13, Wis 13, [[Improved Unarmed Strike (Feat)\|Improved Unarmed Strike]], base attack bonus +14 | Paralyze with unarmed strikes |
| Parry Spell | [[Spellcraft (Skill)\|Spellcraft]] 15 ranks, [[Improved Counterspell (Feat)\|Improved Counterspell]] | Reflect a counterspelled spell back on its caster |
| Parrying Shield\* | [[Shield Proficiency (Feat)\|Shield proficiency]] | Add shield bonus to touch AC |
| Parting Blast | Kinetic blast class feature | Body explodes on death |
| [[Parting Shot (Feat)\|Parting Shot]]\* | [[Shot on the Run (Feat)\|Shot on the Run]], base attack bonus +6 | Make a ranged attack when withdrawing |
| Pass for Human | Half-elf, half-orc, or halfling | +10 on Disguise checks to look like a human |
| Passing Trick\* | Improved Feint, Mobility, size Small or smaller | Successful Acrobatics check allows you to feint |
| Patient Strike | Int 13 | You can choose to ready an attack as a full-round action instead of a standard action |
| Penetrating Shot\* | Str 15, Point Blank Shot, base attack bonus +10 | Your ranged attack targets every foe in 60-ft. line |
| Penetrating Strike\* | Weapon Focus, 12th-level fighter | Your attacks ignore 5 points of damage reduction |
| Perfect Strike\* | Dex 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8 | Roll twice for unarmed strikes and take the better roll |
| Performance Weapon Mastery\* | — | All weapons you are proficient with act as if they had the performance quality |
| Performing Combatant\* | Dazzling Display, any one Performance feat | Can make combat performance checks in any combat |
| Persuasive | — | +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate checks |
| Persuasive Bribery | Persuasive | Bribe effectively and without offending others |
| Phantom Fighter | Phantom class feature, phantom with magic attacks ability | Phantom’s natural weapon attacks and delivered spells have full effect on incorporeal creatures |
| Phantom Fortification | Phantom class feature, phantom with incorporeal flight ability | Phantom has a chance to ignore critical hits and precision-based damage |
| Piercing Evocation | Spell Focus (evocation) or evoker level 1st | 10 points of energy damage from evocation spells becomes untyped damage |
| Piercing Grapple\* | Dex 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Quick Draw, Intimidate 7 ranks | Impale a foe while grappling |
| Pin Down\* | Combat Reflexes, fighter level 11th | Opponents that take 5-foot step or withdraw provoke attack of opportunity from you |
| Pinning Knockout\* | Dex 13, Greater Grapple, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th | Against a pinned opponent, you may double nonlethal damage with grapple check |
| Pinning Rend\* | Dex 13, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, base bonus +9 or monk level 9th | Against pinned opponent, you may deal bleed damage with Grapple check |
| Pinpoint Poisoner\* | Adder Strike, Two-Weapon Fighting or flurry of blows class feature, Craft (alchemy) 6 ranks | When using Adder Strike, you may poison two blowgun darts that can be used in melee |
| Pinpoint Targeting\* | Improved Precise Shot, base attack bonus +16 | No armor or shield bonus on one ranged attack |
| Piranha Strike \* | Weapon Finesse, base attack bonus +1 | Trade melee attack bonus for damage |
| Planar Wild Shape | Wild shape class feature, Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks | May add the celestial or fiendish template to your animal form |
| Planar Wanderer | Cartogramancer, Knowledge (planes) 10 ranks, ability to cast plane shift | Arrive more accurately with plane shift |
| Planned Spontaneity | Knowledge (arcana) 9 ranks, ability to prepare and cast 4th-level spells | Designate one spell slot from each of up to three different spell levels that are lower than the highest-level spell that you can cast. In each designated slot you can memorize two different spells of the respective level |
| Play to the Crowd | Ironclad Logic, Diplomacy 5 ranks, Sense Motive 5 ranks | Learn biases to assist your Diplomacy |
| Plunging Shot | Dex 13, Point Blank Shot | Deal an additional 1d6 points of damage against targets at least 30 feet below you |
| Point Blank Master | Weapon Specialization with a ranged weapon | Do not provoke attacks of opportunity while firing one ranged weapon |
| Point-Blank Shot\* | — | +1 attack and damage on targets within 30 feet |
| Pommel Strike Deed | Amateur Swashbuckler or panache class feature; base attack bonus +3 | Attack with a light or one-handed piercing weapon’s pommel and knock down foes |
| Potent Hex | Hex class feature | You have developed more powerful hexes |
| Power Attack\* | Str 13, base attack bonus +1 | Trade melee attack bonus for damage |
| Power Shot Point | Blank Shot, Str 13, Dex 13, base attack bonus +2 | -3 penalty to hit, gain +1d6 bonus to damage |
| Practical Metamagic | Dragonblood subtype, Spellcraft 8 ranks, any metamagic feat, ability to spontaneously cast 3rd-level spells | Reduce metamagic feat’s spell level increase by one |
| Practiced Spellcaster | Spellcraft 4 ranks | Your caster level is +4 but not above your HD |
| Practiced Tactician | Tactician class feature | Use tactician ability one additional time per day |
| Precise Shot\* | Point-Blank Shot | No penalty for shooting into melee |
| Precise Swing | Base attack bonus +5 | Ignore cover except total cover when making a melee attack |
| Preferred Spell | Spellcraft 5 ranks, Heighten Spell | Spontaneously cast a specific spell |
| Profane Studies | Int 13, Knowledge (planes) 4 ranks, ability  to cast a summon monster spell | Gain +5 on Knowledge checks and +2 CL on summoning durations involving evil outsiders |
| Prone Shooter\* | Weapon Focus (crossbow or firearm), base attack bonus +1 | May ignore penalties for shooting while prone |
| Prone Slinger\* | — | May use a sling while prone |
| Protective Mark | Any true dragonmark | Gain DR 5/magic; spend 1 action point to improve DR for 1 round |
| Psychic Adept | Int 11, Psychic Sensitivity | Cast a psychic knack 3/day as a spell-like ability |
| Psychic Combatant\* | Int 13, Psychic Sensitivity or ability to cast psychic spells or use psychic spell-like abilities, character level 3rd | Gain free manifestation points in psychic duels |
| Psychic Defender | Int 13, Psychic Sensitivity or ability to cast psychic spells or use psychic spell-like abilities, character level 3rd | Gain free temporary hit points when starting a psychic duel |
| Psychic Disciple | Int 13, Psychic Adept, Psychic Sensitivity | Cast a 1st-level psychic spell 2/day as a spell-like ability |
| Psychic Healing | Cha 11, Psychic Sensitivity or ability to cast psychic spells, Heal 3 ranks | Use faith healing to treat deadly wounds and grant temporary hit points |
| Psychic Maestro | Psychic Sensitivity or ability to cast psychic spells | Use occult skill unlocks more often |
| Psychic Sensitivity | — | Use occult skill unlocks for trained skills |
| Psychic Virtuoso | Psychic Sensitivity or ability to cast psychic spells | +2 on checks for occult skill unlock (+4 at 10 ranks) |
| Pummeling Bully\* | Improved Reposition, Improved Trip, Pummeling Style; base attack bonus +9, brawler level 5th, or monk level 5th | When using Pummeling Style, attempt a reposition or trip combat maneuver as a free action |
| Pummeling Charge\* | Pummeling Style; base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th | Pummel after a charge |
| Pummeling Style\* | Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6, brawler’s flurry, or flurry of blows | Pool all unarmed strikes into a single powerful blow |
| Punishing Kick\* | Con 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8 | Knock down or push back foes with unarmed strikes |
| Purging Emesis | Great Fortitude | Vomit an ingested poison |
| Purify Spell-Like Ability | Any good alignment | Adds good descriptor to spell-like ability; neutral creatures take half damage, good creatures take no damage |
| Pursue | Combat Reflexes | Spend action point to occupy square opponent has left |
| Pushing Assault\* | Str 15, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1 | Push a foe back with a two-handed weapon |
| Putrid Summons | Spell Focus (conjuration), ability to cast a *summon monster* or *summon nature’s ally* spell | Summon a single weaker creature that has a horrific stench |

  \* This is a combat feat, and can be selected as a brawler, fighter, gunslinger, swashbuckler, and warpriest bonus feat.
